name: Bright Minds
longDescription: Bright Minds offers customized plans for dyslexic learners.

name: Focus Academy
shortDescription: Coaching for focus and attention improvement.
longDescription: Focus Academy provides structured attention improvement programs.

name: Calm Learning Center
longDescription: Calm Learning Center offers expert autism therapy through individualized sessions.

name: Spark Education Hub
longDescription: Spark Hub uses behavioral science to improve attention, learning, and discipline.

name: NeuroEdge
longDescription: NeuroEdge specializes in cognitive enhancement programs for school-age children.

name: Insight Clinic
longDescription: Insight Clinic helps children improve speech, pronunciation, and verbal expression.

name: ThinkWell
longDescription: ThinkWell offers scientifically-backed training to improve memory and retention for school students.
